1.Â Kentucky Fried Chicken 33 Main St Port Jervis , NY 12771 GET DIRECTIONS: Starting Address: City: State: Zip: Ending Address: City: State: Zip: If you are unable to view this map, please clear your browser's cache or enable JavaScript. REVIEWER RATING: rated on: 11/26/2008 The Colonel would be spinning.... Pros: None Cons: Slow help, food that's been sitting out, not clean "This place is beyond slow... dirty... and the last (and I mean VERY LAST!) time I went there I got a nasty case of food poisoning... go ANYWHERE but here!" REVIEWER RATING: rated on: 11/09/2008 slow "slow slow if a see more then three people in line i know i have a 20 min wait no kiddding.and they mess up my order 20% of the time" REVIEWER RATING: rated on: 07/16/2008 SLOW!!! "icky, slow, but alas the only KFC in 25miles." We didn't find any Coupons for this Business.
